personalInfo.name: Abhishek Kumar
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a strong background in building modern, scalable web applications. Lets collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

projects.title: Stream Master
projects.description: This project is a Node.js application that provides a variety of endpoints for managing users, videos, playlists, subscriptions, likes, comments, and more. The application leverages JSON Web Tokens for authentication, bcrypt for password hashing, Mongoose for MongoDB object modeling, and aggregation for complex data retrieval.

projects.title: E-commerce
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website enabling shopkeepers to create accounts, sell products, and buyers to create accounts, purchase products, and add to cart.

projects.title: Doctor Appointment System
projects.description: Developed a Doctor Appointment System where patients can create accounts and schedule appointments with doctors.Implemented a feature for users to apply as doctors, with an admin approval process etc.

keyResponsibilities: Implemented RESTful  APIs using Node.js and Express.
Integrated third-party services and APIs to enhance application functionality.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.description: I am currently pursuing a comprehensive curriculum in computer science, focusing on topics such as data structures, algorithms, software engineering, and artificial intelligence. As part of this ongoing course, I am actively involved in projects, including the development of a web application for managing student organizations and contributing to a cancer detection system.
Completed my Senior Secondary School Certificate Examination from the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), specializing in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry.
Completed my Senior Secondary School Certificate Examination from the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), specializing in Mathematics, Science,Social Science and Sanskirt.
